Html:
Hi again,

The current version is targeted at .NET 3.5 and WPF oriented, is there any chance of a .NET 2.0 / Win Forms version coming up?

Actually I'm just interested in a .NET 2.0 version for the graph layout engine (mainly because I don't want the whopping .NET 3.5 download for my modest business app).

 

Gracias,

Wout
Sorry, but I don't plan to support WinForms / .NET 2.0. It would be a lot of work, to backport this component (especially the GraphLayout control).
But if you can use .NET 3.5, you can host the WPF based GraphLayout control in an ElementHost in your WinForm application.
i do the same as i draw a graph xmal and used it in winform using elementhost but it will not show the graph on winform...
